targets.expr: topk_max(3, sum(rate(http_requests_total{ service_prometheus_track="sharecone-service", id="sharecone-service-canary", status=~"${Status}", route=~"${Path}"}[1m])) by (route,status,kubernetes_pod_name))

panels.title: hamsa api total request rate (by pod, topk)

targets.expr: topk_max(3, histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(http_request_duration_seconds_bucket{ service_prometheus_track="sharecone-service", id="sharecone-service-canary", route=~"${Path}", status=~"${Status}"}[1m])) by (le,route,status,kubernetes_pod_name)))

panels.title: hamsa api total p99 latency (by pod, topk)

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(nginx_ingress_controller_request_duration_seconds_bucket{ ingress="sharecone-service", status=~"${Status}"}[1m] offset 24h)) by (le, status, ${By}))

panels.title: hamsa api total p99 latency - ingress view

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(nginx_ingress_controller_request_duration_seconds_bucket{ ingress="sharecone-service", status=~"${Status}"}[1m] offset 24h)) by (le, status, ${By}))

panels.title: hamsa api total p95 latency - ingress view

targets.expr: ((sum(rate(nginx_ingress_controller_requests{ ingress="sharecone-service", status=~"[4|5].*"}[1m])) by (status, ${By})) > 0) / ignoring(status) group_left() (sum(rate(nginx_ingress_controller_requests{ ingress="sharecone-service"}[1m])) by (${By}))

panels.title: hamsa api bad responses ratio - ingress view
hamsa api index wise request rate
hamsa api index wise request rate (max)
hamsa api index wise p99 latency
hamsa api index wise p99 latency (worst)
sharecone-service container cpu cores (sum by deployment) - ${GcpProject}

metricQuery.query:
fetch k8s_pod
| metric 'networking.googleapis.com/pod_flow/egress_bytes_count'
| filter resource.pod_name =~ 'sharecone-service-.*' && metric.remote_zone != metadata.system.node_zone && resource.cluster_name = 'moj-p-ds-generic-services-02'
| align delta()
| group_by
    [deployment_id: metadata.user.id, node_zone: metadata.system.node_zone],
    [value_egress_bytes_count_sum: sum(value.egress_bytes_count)]
| every 1m

fetch k8s_pod
| metric 'networking.googleapis.com/pod_flow/egress_bytes_count'
| filter resource.pod_name =~ 'sharecone-service-.*' && metric.remote_zone != metadata.system.node_zone && resource.cluster_name = 'moj-p-ds-generic-services-02'
| align delta()
| group_by
    [deployment_id: metadata.user.id, node_zone: metadata.system.node_zone],
    24h,
    [value_egress_bytes_count_sum: sum(value.egress_bytes_count)]
| every 1h

panels.title: index-builder container cpu cores (sum by deployment) - ${GcpProject}

targets.expr: topk(10, sum(rate(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total{ namespace="sharecone", pod=~"hamsa-index-builder-.*"}[1m])) by (pod) / sum(rate(container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{ namespace="sharecone", pod=~"hamsa-index-builder-.*"}[1m])) by (pod))

panels.title: tf-service index wise request rate (by pod, topk)
tf-service index wise p99 latency (by pod, topk)

targets.expr: topk(10, sum(rate(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total{ namespace="sharecone", pod=~"hamsa-tf-service-.*"}[1m])) by (pod) / sum(rate(container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{ namespace="sharecone", pod=~"hamsa-tf-service-.*"}[1m])) by (pod))

topk(10, sum(rate(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total{ namespace="sharecone", exported_pod=~"hamsa-tf-service-.*"}[1m])) by (exported_pod) / sum(rate(container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{ namespace="sharecone", exported_pod=~"hamsa-tf-service-.*"}[1m])) by (exported_pod))

panels.title: tf-service container cpu cores (sum by deployment) - ${GcpProject}

metricQuery.query:
fetch k8s_pod
| metric 'networking.googleapis.com/pod_flow/egress_bytes_count'
| filter metadata.user.id =~ '${TfService:pipe}' && metric.remote_zone != metadata.system.node_zone && resource.cluster_name = 'moj-p-ds-generic-services-02'
| align delta()
| group_by
    [deployment_id: metadata.user.id, node_zone: metadata.system.node_zone],
    [value_egress_bytes_count_sum: sum(value.egress_bytes_count)]
| every 1m

fetch k8s_pod
| metric 'networking.googleapis.com/pod_flow/egress_bytes_count'
| filter metadata.user.id =~ '${TfService:pipe}' && metric.remote_zone != metadata.system.node_zone && resource.cluster_name = 'moj-p-ds-generic-services-02'
| align delta()
| group_by
    [deployment_id: metadata.user.id, node_zone: metadata.system.node_zone],
    24h,
    [value_egress_bytes_count_sum: sum(value.egress_bytes_count)]
| every 1h

fetch k8s_pod
| metric 'networking.googleapis.com/pod_flow/egress_bytes_count'
| filter resource.pod_name =~ 'hamsa-tf-service-.*' && metric.remote_zone != metadata.system.node_zone && resource.cluster_name = 'moj-p-ds-generic-services-02'
| align delta()
| group_by
    [node_zone: metadata.system.node_zone],
    [value_egress_bytes_count_sum: sum(value.egress_bytes_count)]
| every 1m

fetch k8s_pod
| metric 'networking.googleapis.com/pod_flow/egress_bytes_count'
| filter resource.pod_name =~ 'hamsa-tf-service-.*' && metric.remote_zone != metadata.system.node_zone && resource.cluster_name = 'moj-p-ds-generic-services-02'

targets.expr: sum(rate(hamsa_posts_count_sum[1m])) by (hamsa_stage, indexSuffix) / sum(rate(hamsa_posts_count_count)[1m]) by (hamsa_stage, indexSuffix)

metricQuery.query:
fetch filestore_instance
| metric 'file.googleapis.com/nfs/server/write_bytes_count'
| filter (resource.instance_name == 'hamsa-index-nfs')
| align rate(1m)
| every 1m

fetch filestore_instance
| metric 'file.googleapis.com/nfs/server/read_bytes_count'
| filter (resource.instance_name == 'hamsa-index-nfs')
| align rate(1m)
| every 1m

fetch filestore_instance
| metric 'file.googleapis.com/nfs/server/procedure_call_count'
| filter (resource.instance_name == 'hamsa-index-nfs')
| align rate(1m)
| filter value != 0
| every 1m

fetch filestore_instance
| metric 'file.googleapis.com/nfs/server/used_bytes_percent'
| filter (resource.instance_name == 'hamsa-index-nfs')
| group_by 1m, [value_used_bytes_percent_mean: mean(value.used_bytes_percent)]
| every 1m

fetch filestore_instance
| metric 'file.googleapis.com/nfs/server/used_bytes'
| filter (resource.instance_name == 'hamsa-index-nfs')
| group_by 1m, [value_used_bytes_mean: mean(value.used_bytes)]
| every 1m
